Chinese clubs 'interested in Bony'

Lille have opened negotiations over Wilfried Bony according to French outlet RMC.

But they’re going to have competition from the Chinese Super League.

The Independent reported that are number of Chinese clubs are interested and that is being ‘prioritised by City’ who believe they could recoup perhaps half of the £28m they paid to sign the forward in 2015.
